item.title: Send multiple records to workflow
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Implement bulk workflow operations in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using X++. Complete code examples for submitting, approving, rejecting, and recalling multiple records through workflows.
